name: rex lewis
text: Clean friendly folks. Only down side 12 weeks to get a boat.  Which have no control out of.

name: rusty shacklford
text: Super helpful staff, usually have what I need in stock. Service department is top notch.

name: Mandolina Newman
text: Great folks to deal with.

name: Anna Claire Knight
text: Brad and Kathy were absolutely amazing in our boat purchasing process. They were extremely patient as we experienced a death in the family right when we were looking to go pick up the boat. Although we had never met either of them, they reached out multiple times only to see how we were doing and making sure we were okay. There’s nothing like feeling like people care when making a big purchase! Strongly recommend.

name: ashlee laughter
text: Justin, Brad & Kathy were AWESOME! We had a terrible experience at another location but let me tell you. The folks here at the Florence location REALLY were on their A game and took great care of my family & I. And we walked out happy proud new boat owners. Will definitely go back for anything else we may need along the way.

name: Ronald Thompson
text: This place is great

name: Brian Bastel
text: We were visiting from several hours away and they figured out a problem none of our mechanics from home could. It was the best customer service experience I’ve had in years. As a business owner that has built a business around customer service, I literally couldn’t have been more impressed with the experience and the entire staff!!!

name: gabriel hay
text: Top notch people. Absolutely no pressure to buy extra items. Very friendly.  We had a problem with our trailer lights connection.  3 people jumped right on it. It was a issue on the vehicle.  They fixed it quickly and didn't charge a dime. Great people.

name: Michael Brown
text: Service was good. One worker was there filling in from Lawrenceburg that was quite smart mouthed. Not much help and not very friendly.

name: Chad Hunter
text: Terrible customer service. We bought a new pontoon in May and we have 3.1 hours on it.  Our family has been stranded in a lightning storm with 4 small children.  This was the third time back to their service center for the same reason .  All the service employees have acted like we are stupid and we don't know how to drive a boat or put a gas cap on correctly. I would not reccomend anyone to this business.

name: Lance Clark
text: Lots of selection, and the sales staff was helpful but not pushy.  We were looking at the xp3 pontoon boats, and they had both new and used to choose from.

name: Mark Simpson
text: I have been dealing with Mike and his staff for years! They go out of their way to take care all your boating needs!

name: Bert Meharg
text: Wish I had know this place 6 boats,ago Great Service and Sales Prices un-beatable !!!

name: Sabrina Bryson
text: Very polite and helpful staff.   I would recommend them for all your boating needs.

name: Lynn Brewer
text: They are nice  people but the price you see is the price you pay.

name: Michael Francis
text: Nice Place, Good Guys! I'll be Back!

name: Fred Pearson
text: Friendly professional staff

name: Patrick White
text: Good place to take boat for repairs fast and friendly

name: Michael Riddle
text: Clean store good service

name: Charles bavar
text: Got the parts I needed, they were very helpful.  Kind , thank you for your help.

name: Bobby Boyles
text: So far so good.

name: Lizette Morris
text: Great friendly people

name: Derek South
text: Has decent service department.

name: Myron Price
text: Bass buggy and good service !

name: TOmmy Elliott
text: If you need a boat or have questions ask Justin.

name: Linda Hodges
text: Very nice shop.  Good place to take children or elderly.

name: Reade Atkinson
text: Worst costumer service I have ever experienced and not only this location. I was the second person in line and even told the clerk I was second in line. Even the person behind me said yes he was here first but the clerk still helped thre 3rd person before me. I will never go to any Bass Pro or use any of there services. If you want my money you should have hired better employees.

name: Bill Cooper
text: Santa was wonderful. My kids played while we waited for our picture time and they loved it. We traded off shopping and watching them so time went by quickly. It was crowded but with the kids busy in their corner of the store we were all happy. No grumpy people.

name: HUGH E Long
text: Ashley is a great person! She understands customer service! Ed  is in the fudge shop to help you with your choice of fudge!

name: Paul millard
text: I hate going there it makes me want to go in dep

name: Turpin Ashurst
text: Excellent service by knowable clerks.

name: Mike Tillman
text: Poor quality service from inexperienced kids!

name: Debbie Kinler
text: We've had several projects completed here and have always been very satisfied. Some were as complicated as bimini/solar panel integrations and others just simple restitching. All were completed when promised and work was professional. As we have discovered over the years in different places, that's not always the case. At Canvas Works they listen to you, discuss the options and deliver the product as promised. Very happy to have them!

name: Eric Reuss
text: I had the Canvas Works make a cushion for my boat, having provided it an exact duplicate of the item I wanted. The cushion was made and delivered to me. Instead of using the normal inside cushion material, Canvas Works put in a slab of cheap foam rubber, which provided no cushioning at all. When I brought back the product to be corrected, the business owner told me she put in to the cushion the foam rubber I had given her, which was a patent lie; I provided no materials to her, only giving her the direction that I wanted a duplicate of the the existing cushion, which I provided her to duplicate. She refused to make the correction, told me to come pick up the cushion, then hung up on me. I went to pick up the cushion, from which the cheap foam rubber had been ripped out.

name: Lex Rosenbaum
text: King helped us a lot. Very good care of my boat canvas. Came out beautiful

name: melisa yeend
text: Very fine work and great people working there.

name: Cory Blanton
text: Purchased a used Stratos from Dawson in February of this year ('21). The sales experience was great and very thorough. The staff even stayed late to give me some maintenance tips for motor longevity. After using the boat for a few months, I'm even happier with the treatment at Dawson. Highly recommended.

name: Jessie Brock
text: Like everyone else has already said... awesome experience buying a boat from Dawson Boat Center. Good people who are willing to go out of their way to help  you get what you need. 10/10

name: Allen McPherson
text: Greg Dawson has always been great with all my boats. I would recommend Dawson Boat center to anyone interested in Ranger boats.

name: Donald Anderson
text: Very nice place, very friendly and eager to help you get what you need for your boat and trailers

name: Casey Jones
text: I purchased a pre-owned 2019 Ranger RT188 and couldn't be happier with the boat and the price was more than fair considering the condition of the boat. I still can't believe the boat was pre-owned it looked brand new. If you wan't a no hassle sales process ask for Joel and you will be pleased with how simple he made the process for me. We financed the boat and the finance company they use in house made it easy and was simple and transparent.  I would recommend Dawson Boat Center for anyone looking for bass boat.

name: Fred Rivers
text: Great folks to do business with. Although I purchased a used Ranger somewhere else, they have helped me tremendously as a first time Ranger owner. If I ever upgrade to a new boat I will go to Dawson Boat Center.

name: Randolph McArthur
text: Only been there twice for parts and both times unbelievably rude.

name: Sylvia McBride
text: I think this is the Only place my hubby uses for his boat needs... For years...

name: Mark Mason
text: Always great

name: JASON FOSTER
text: I have no words to describe the quality of the service I've received from this business. From top to bottom you're treated like family! Thank you all for the amazing family that you share with the public. Joel, you're outstanding in the down to earth approach you brought to me and I'm sure that you do with the rest of your customers.

name: michael petty
text: Not very nice

name: Scott Leisure
text: Would highly recommend - was on vacation from Indiana and ran into trailer problems that would’ve prevented us from leaving on time. Dawson’s took time out of their already busy day and got us going in no time. I really appreciate their kindness and understanding to help us out in a pinch. Thanks again!

name: Humminbird Tips & Tricks
text: I have been going to Dawson's for a few years now. I live in TN but I will travel the hour and a half just to go here for all my boat servicing needs. Their customer service is amazing and their maintenance team is top notch! Highly recommended!!!!

name: Tom Mclemore
text: Greg n his team give great service and he can't be beat on Ranger prices. They have been in business for years for a reason, service after the sale.

name: Heath Grubbs
text: Very sweet people and very very helpful! I would strongly recommend them. They treat you like family. And they were the only one that had the part in Scottsboro or guntersville that I need for my Minn Kota!

name: Tammie Mann
text: Very nice place. Always willing to help in any way they can. I even broke down on the water one time. They brought the parts to me to fix the boat. Just bought a new one from them .

name: Matt Tibbs
text: U can get pretty goods deal on boats go see them

name: Carl McGuire
text: Very friendly,  patient and informative, with lots of Ranger boats on display.

name: sarah harpenau
text: i had boat trouble on guntersville lake and they dropped what they were doing and worked on my boat and got me going right away. Mark from Santa Claus, in.

name: Ed Hood
text: good shop, great folks, usually a looong waiting list!

name: JERRY Carter
text: I like Dawson Boat Center. Love their customer service.

name: Debbie Fanning
text: Very helpful service and the owner, Greg Dawson, is very easy to work with.

name: rusty summers
text: They had what I needed..

name: Deborah Fiddler
text: Owner has great presence.

name: Eric Prewett
text: Excellent products

name: Crystal Ball
text: Terrible parking lot,  didn't see all the holes for being filled with rain, hit one so bad, now car isn't driving right, pulling to the left.

resp.text: Sorry about your vehicle, but we keep our parking lot well paved with no potholes.

name: Joey
text: Came in from out of town to fish broke down the staff was Friendly went above and beyond to get me back on the water the same day

name: Glenn Priest
text: Great Guys to deal with !

name: mike clinard
text: Great place to do busibess

name: Timothy Edmonds
text: Say they are going to hire someone then change there mind then say we are not hiring no one so wasting your time here ha

name: Danny Niblett
text: First visit and the ladie in the front office was super nice as well as the gentleman who works in the back . Looking forward to getting my awning back up.

name: Sexy Scorpio
text: Ok

name: Jeremy Fisher
text: Helpful
